Tucson looks back to Big Convoy.  He was bent on going through.

"We contin=
ue on, we take our chances through the portal.  Something tells me it's the=
 way to go.  All right, this is it, all or nothing."

With another powerful=
 roar, he charges onward, this time, slowly extending his wings, feeling th=
at the need for flight would come soon enough.  He could feel his limbs com=
ming off the ground, as he extends his talons to Big Convoy and the others.=


"Those of you who can get on my back, do so now, Big Convoy, grab onto my=
 talons, and hold on as tight as you can.  I sense I may need to take fligh=
t..  Something is driving me to fly."

 Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

is last words he throws out a thunderous roar.  His pace quickens upon

approach of the portal.  He also hoped that if there was anyone on the othe=

hoed everywhere! Even the walls and floor seemed to

nd of it!

oom

similar in construction the one that he himself had went through when

was being brought into this base.

iptive, basic gun metal grey
> walls, a few monitors and consoles around th=
e room and, besides the
> door that TUSCON entered, there were two others. =
Other than that the
> room was barren and quiet, only the slight humming fr=
om the portal
> could be heard.

> BIG CONVOY, BREAK and MACH KICK entere=
d slowly behind TUSCON their
> weapons out as they watched TUSCON's back.
>=
 
> "There are more guards approaching your position." LONG RACK said over
=
> their comlink. "What ever you're going to do you'd better do it
> quick."=

> 
> "How many?" BIG CONVOY said.
> 
> "All of them?" LONG RACK came back.=
 Of course that was probably an
> overstatement, but one can gather that a =
lot of SHARKTICONS were about
> to rush through the door soon. However the =
alarms were still going
> off.
> 
> CONVOY looked over at TUSCON, "Seems li=
ke we got a choice to make. We
> can face the fire here, or we can take our=
 chances through that." He
> pointed at the portal.

med to be a good one. Not even TUSCON or BIG CONVOY

AGMATRON's full forces, especially if MAGMATRON
